tool_description: CargoMATE translates emails and text into actionable quotes and bookings.
name: CargoMATE
title: CargoMATE

api_list.name: CargoMATE
api_list.description: call API with text and retrieve structured data with shipment informations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cargomate.p.rapidapi.com/ai/shipment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cargomate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cargomate.p.rapidapi.com/ai/shipment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cargomate.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
